page.title: 05Dairy farming
page.content: My Dad is a{farmer}who keeps a herd of the black and white{Friesian cows for their milk. The cows come into the {milking parlour}four at a time and they are milked by machine. My Dad usually finishes work about six o'clock but when the cows are{calving then he has to stay with them whatever the time. We have{two dogs}which help to bring the cows in for milking.They also work with{sheep}when my Dad has a few. At the moment he is{haymaking.}The hay has been cut and baled and now the tractors are going down to the fields to bring the bales in.My Dad drives a red and grey{Massey Fergusson tractor. After school I like to go down to the hayfields and have a{picnic, especially when the hay is being cut. If I am lucky, I get a ride home on the tractor!.
